metadata.description: Claude Code plugin collection with RepoPrompt and Codex integrations

plugins.name: repoprompt-pair-pipeline
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration for complex coding tasks with RepoPrompt. Scouts gather raw context, planners synthesize architectural narrative prompts covering (A) Clear Outcome Specification - success criteria, edge cases; (B) Architectural Specification - code structure, dependencies, component details; (C) Implementation Steps - ordered, verifiable sub-tasks. RepoPrompt creates detailed plans with minimal ambiguity. Parallel coders execute with self-verification.

plugins.name: pair-pipeline
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration for complex coding tasks without RepoPrompt. Full discovery loop with user checkpoints, fast planning, and parallel execution. Self-contained with no MCP dependencies.

plugins.name: pair-swarm
plugins.description: One-shot swarm commands for planning and coding. /plan spawns parallel scouts to create implementation plans. /code spawns parallel coders to execute plans. No iterative loops - fast parallel execution for well-defined tasks.

plugins.name: repoprompt-swarm
plugins.description: One-shot swarm commands with RepoPrompt planning. /plan spawns parallel scouts, then RepoPrompt creates architectural plans. /code spawns parallel coders that fetch from RepoPrompt. Fast parallel execution with intelligent planning.

plugins.name: codex-pair-pipeline
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration for complex coding tasks with Codex MCP. Scouts gather raw context, planners synthesize architectural narrative prompts with gpt-5.2. Uses Architect system prompt for detailed implementation plans. Iterative discovery with user checkpoints and parallel execution.

plugins.name: codex-swarm
plugins.description: One-shot swarm commands with Codex MCP planning. /plan spawns parallel scouts, then Codex creates architectural plans using gpt-5.2. /code spawns parallel coders that fetch from Codex. Fast parallel execution with intelligent planning.
